title: twisted treeline problems (for kayn)
body: while playing as {{champion:141}} a little while ago, i kept running into a problem while collecting blue essence, when i absorbed it it didnt apply to the bar, is this ment to slow him down or just a bug?

replies.body: As far as I've been able to gather, there aren't any special systems in place meant to slow down Kayn's essence generation. I want you to go ahead and post this over in [**Report a Bug**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), that way our devs will be able to track this issue and look into for you!
